g.text: 1.3. DFSP1 sends a Prepare Transfer request to DFSP2 - Prepare Position Failure
Routes & Publishes Prepare event for DFSP1
Ensures that event is replicated as configured (ACKS=all)
Responds replication acknoledgements have been received
Consumes Prepare event message for DFSP1
Request to retrieve Transfer (if it exists)
Validates message signature (to be confirmed in future requirement)
Routes & Publishes Position event for DFSP1
Consumes Position event message for DFSP1
Request latest position from DB for DFSP1
Retrieves latest position from DB for DFSP1
Calculates latest position (lpos) by incrementing transfer for prepare
Validate Calculated latest position against the net-debit cap (netcap) - Rule: lpos < netcap
Requests Notification details for DFSP1 - GET - HTTP://notifications/DFPS1
HTTP Callback with Prepare result to DFSP1
